thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Molly Stewart (Milford Lodge Child Care Centre)
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Molly Stewart (Milford Lodge Child Care Centre)

author: Molly Stewart (Milford Lodge Child Care Centre)
title: Molly Stewart (Milford Lodge Child Care Centre)
text:
Had been considering purchasing company USBs for all of my (Early Childhood) employees for a fair while. Emailed Flashbay for a quick Quote: and they sent back an entire box of USBs to look through with a comprehensive price list. The proof was sent through almost immediately, and then with only one small change we received our USBs within about 3 working days!
I would highly recommend purchasing through Flashbay.
